newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-ITEQ started as outperform.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-ITEQ started as outperform.

text.p: EVEREN Securities Inc said Friday it initiated coverage of ITEQ Inc with an outperformer rating for both the near and long term.
- EVEREN said its earnings per share estimate is $0.46 for 1997 and $0.68 in 1998.
- Its near-term price target for the company is $9 a share and its long-term target is $13. ITEQ closed up 3/4 on Friday at 7-3/4.
- "We believe ITEQ is an excellent investment at current valuation levels and recommend purchase of its shares," analyst Quint Nufer said in a statement. He cited ITEQ's consolidation strategy.
- ITEQ supplies manufactured equipment and engineered systems and services.
